Decision Made to Award "International Kim Il Sung Prize" to Former Namibian President
   Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The "International Kim Il Sung Prize" Council decided on April 10 to award the "International Kim Il Sung Prize" to former President of Namibia Sam Nujoma in recognition of his great contributions to achieving genuine freedom and independence of his country and accomplishing the cause of global independence and peace.

Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy in Jakarta
   Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Megawati Soekarnoputri, former president of Indonesia who is chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Jakarta on April 10 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
